title: cascoinking
author: cascoinking
content: I have been wanting to invest in other items so wanting some capital and decided to auction off a 1 of a kind very rare Papersafe Paperweight used a project of theirs in 2016.This was auctioned off back then at 0.4btcI then acquired it with signatures from People at papersafe i do believe greenplastic owned it at one point.This has been kept in bag and in my safe every since bought.http://imgur.com/gallery/p9olPOzStarting at .01 BTC NO RESERVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.01 BTCEND TIME: March 8th, 10 PM Eastern Time- Any bid made in last 10 minutes will extend that lot 10 minutes further until there are no bids for 10 consecutive minutes.- Payment due within 24 hours of auction end- BTC payment address bc1qhc5w3kymcrm476cwgpjdhszs4x30dmgawlj000- Shipping: Free within Canada

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: cascoinking on March 05, 2023, 04:38:49 PMhttp://imgur.com/gallery/p9olPOzYou are a JR member as well as a copper member but you have posted a direct link. To show the image directly without opening the link you should post the link in image format. For example, it should be like .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif, etc. Please see below:Code:https://i.imgur.com/vY6lWlW.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/GIwnjCR.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/y8Tm52S.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/26QL9lt.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/vzQyiVb.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/e1xMpaT.jpegQuote

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: BUYERS BEWARE!!!I PURCHASED THREE ITEMS FROM THIS SELLER, PAID HIM, AND HE NEVER SHIPPED. DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THIS PERSON. CASCOINKING, YOU OWE ME THE BTCC/SATORI ITEMS I PAID FOR AND YOU NEVER SHIPPED. IF YOU WANT TO MAKE GOOD ON THIS PURCHASE, I STILL HAVE ALL OF OUR MESSAGES AND TRANSFER ID AS PROOF. YOU GHOSTED ME AFTER I PAID YOU. LESSON LEARNED THE CONSEQUENCES OF NOT USING ESCROW.AGAIN, IF YOU WANT TO SHIP MY ITEMS I PAID YOU FOR ALONG WITH SHIPPING, I WILL CONSIDER REMOVING MY NEGATIVE TRUST. I THINK MY TRUST LEVEL SPEAKS FOR THE FACT I AM NOT FULL OF SH*T WHEN I STATE THIS ON YOUR POST.PICS OF MESSAGES:https://imgur.com/a/Tc8um1m

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: You scummed people out of sats and are trying to sell stuff here lol.¬† This place never changes.üòê

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: I don't think you will be able to sell it at Auction as no one will bid for the item. It is because you are a proven scammer. Also, on the item, you have not mentioned your name/signature and date. You have woken up from a long period of inactivity. Also, you have not mentioned that escrow can be used.As the auction time ended I think it will be better if you lock the thread and think twice before opening an auction.

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: Agree, if seller would send items to me that I paid him for prior per our forum agreement, I would consider removing my negative trust but at this point I want to prevent others from being scammed like he did to me.
